label: Non-Violent Protests
description: Non-violent demonstrations composed of citizens, workers, or security forces.

label: Violent Protests
description: Violence directed towards citizens or security forces by protesters or an unidentified party

label: Movement of Security Forces
description: Mass movement of non-combative security forces.

label: Violent Supression
description: Violence directed towards protesters, citizens, or unidentified parties by security forces.

label: Foreign Intervention
description: Introduction of CSTO soldiers in Kazakhstan.
